message.body: Riechert is now live! Streaming I Wanna Be the Guy: Me Back! Humbies Abodies (day 2.69)

I imagine you in the shower with the laptop
Hello my goat and my furry
How are you still a sub here
Otiwolf I say this again I played your game and the gravity vines are to hard for me
Zen why you send a leve on piranhatoooth stream and gone?
You not answer what I said you on discord
turns out making non black and white visuals are pretty damn hard
make it purple and yellow. surely it cant go wrong then
my next game, after goobers, might be inspired by cn3 and explore the map
@OtiWolf crimson needle 3? no, scarlet needle xdd
also beware of the bangers in this game
I really like the songs used here
i factory reset my laptop, i just realized i dont have gms2 anymore and needle thing
did you had a game project
Oti how much rooms this game has?
there is no platform snap, I only have to figure out how to make them disappear once used (I love disappearing platforms)
This is the oti needle but harder?
we found the rng platform skip
you can still land on them but you won't snap
that hole up there is for the aling, just have to indicate it more
a webcam of paint drying to add to the nonstop action
time to turn this inot a dplane
I was mainly sharing this area around cuz I really like it
"if you press R, it treats it as F4" that would be funny
this is where I run out of ideas
I'll rework floor 12 completely it's so ass
no clue why there's no fade out for this floor but yeah
I can tell you who made this if you want
I believe the blue one was Skull
I've cleared some games in silver tier
you can check my clear list to see how much "fun" I had
gl with cultured 2 that's a big one
Sometimes you have to make sacrifices
I prefer platforming overall but that kind of needle looks plain unfun to me
I don't know why either because I mostly play platforming stuff
I don't mind trying some avoidance here and there but it's not my thing
I'm curious now about why lol
I say platforming and not needle to try to mean everything non boss because people have specific definitions of needle
RandomChaos has made a bunch of easier avoidances that are playable for me, I like those
we have cheap viewers, where are the expensive streamers
that is quite a bit of time
You don't feel like you improve but if you replay a game a bunch of time later the results are clear. At least that's how I feel
Kermit 3 has some crazy tough saves
i also will never play through K3 haha
game just doesn't seem that appealing to me
how do you know it has some crazy tough saves then plasma......
I acknowledge that Kamilia does some things really well
the feeling of progression in K3 is really good
CN 1 and 2 isnt for me but CN3 is a game I really love
i would not have enjoyed it with a much lower skill level though, i already struggled enough as is
but CN3's platforming is just SO GOOD
Yeah that was my feeling with some needle games, they were good but I would have enjoyed them more if I was better.
so many creative things and satisfying gameplay
CN2 is too normal for my taste
the boss seems really fun for CN2
I'm not trying to insult Kale's needle here, but I do think 2 is worth a play even if it's just to play the boss. That's probably one of my favourite bosses in any fangame.
i also only play in fullscreen
Going to sleep now, gl aboding
i found a paid tool through google haha
i have no idea if it works but yeah
i remember nothing about this game
i mean i started making it for secret santa 2 years ago
yeah it was my secret santa for draconical
i made like 1.5 minutes of the avoidance back then
and now it is... much longer haha
and obviously the later parts took longer and longer to make haha
i mean i always shill gms2
the cube port of yoyo engine fore gms2 is decent
it doesnt fully utilize the improvements in gms2 yet but it is alright
but i know i will never give up latest gamemaker
because of all the improvements to the coding
i have no idea what engines people actually use these days
i dont use other people's engines
might be better to ask others
i am making my own gms2 engine at the moment that i plan on publishing later
could use that when it is done :^)
though that is not a needle purist type engine
so L-Needle lovers need not apply
the old collision system is just really shitty
and a lot of needle tech is based on it being shitty
